annotations.label: Text
annotations.text: 电子信息发送服务提供者、应用软件下载服务提供者，不履行本法第四十八条第二款规定的安全管理义务的，依照前款规定处罚。
annotations.translation: Service providers for electronic information transmission and application software download who fail to perform the security management obligations stipulated in the second paragraph of Article 48 of this Law will face punishment in accordance with the provisions of the preceding paragraph.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第六十八条 网络运营者违反本法第四十七条规定，对法律、行政法规禁止发布或者传输的信息未停止传输、采取消除等处置措施、保存有关记录的，由有关主管部门责令改正，给予警告，没收违法所得；拒不改正或者情节严重的，处十万元以上五十万元以下罚款，并可以责令暂停相关业务、停业整顿、关闭网站、吊销相关业务许可证或者吊销营业执照，对直接负责的主管人员和其他直接责任人员处一万元以上十万元以下罚款。
annotations.translation: Article 68: If a network operator violates the provisions of Article 47 of this Law by failing to cease the transmission of prohibited information as defined by laws or administrative regulations from being published or transmitted, take measures to eliminate such information, or keep records of such information, the competent authority will order the network operator to make corrections, issue a warning, and confiscate any illegal income; if the network operator refuses to make corrections or if the circumstances are severe, a fine ranging from one hundred thousand to five hundred thousand yuan shall be imposed. The network operator may also be ordered to suspend relevant operations, suspend the business activities for rectification, shut down the website, and revoke the relevant business permit or license, and fines ranging from one thousand to ten thousand yuan may be imposed on the supervisor directly responsible and other individuals directly accountable.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第六十九条 网络运营者违反本法规定，有下列行为之一的，由有关主管部门责令改正；拒不改正或者情节严重的，处五万元以上五十万元以下罚款，对直接负责的主管人员和其他直接责任人员，处一万元以上十万元以下罚款：
annotations.translation: Article 69: Any network operator who violates the provisions of this Law and commits one of the acts listed below shall be ordered to make corrections by the relevant competent authority; if the network operator refuses to make corrections or the circumstances are severe, a fine ranging from fifty thousand to five hundred thousand yuan shall be imposed, and fines ranging from ten thousand to one hundred thousand shall be imposed on the supervisor directly responsible and other individuals directly accountable:

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （一）不按照有关部门的要求对法律、行政法规禁止发布或者传输的信息，采取停止传输、消除等处置措施的；
annotations.translation: (1) Failing to take measures as required by the relevant authorities to cease the transmission or elimination of the information that is prohibited from being released or transmitted as defined by laws and administrative regulations;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （二）拒绝、阻碍有关部门依法实施的监督检查的；
annotations.translation: (2) Refusing or obstructing the supervision and inspection carried out by the relevant authorities in accordance with the law;

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: （三）拒不向公安机关、国家安全机关提供技术支持和协助的。
annotations.translation: (3) Refusing to provide technical support or assistance to public security organs or state security organs.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第七十条 发布或者传输本法第十二条第二款和其他法律、行政法规禁止发布或者传输的信息的，依照有关法律、行政法规的规定处罚。
annotations.translation: Article 70: Whoever publishes or transmits the information as prohibited by the second paragraph of Article XII of this Law or any other law or administrative regulation shall be punished in accordance with the relevant laws and administrative regulations.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第七十一条 有本法规定的违法行为的，依照有关法律、行政法规的规定记入信用档案，并予以公示。
annotations.translation: Article 71: If there is a violation of the law as stipulated in this Law, it shall be documented in the credit file in accordance with the provisions of relevant laws and administrative regulations and shall be publicized.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第七十二条 国家机关政务网络的运营者不履行本法规定的网络安全保护义务的，由其上级机关或者有关机关责令改正；对直接负责的主管人员和其他直接责任人员依法给予处分。
annotations.translation: Article 72: If operators of government affairs networks of state organs fail to perform their cybersecurity protection obligations as stipulated in this Law, their superior organs or relevant organs shall order them to rectify the situation; the supervisor directly responsible and other individuals directly accountable shall be subject to penalties accordance with the law.

annotations.label: List-item
annotations.text: 第七十三条 网信部门和有关部门违反本法第三十条规定，将在履行网络安全保护职责中获取的信息用于其他用途的，对直接负责的主管人员和其他直接责任人员依法给予处分。
annotations.translation: Article 73: If cybersecurity and informatization departments, as well as relevant authorities, violate the provisions of Article 30 of this Law by misusing information obtained during the performance of cybersecurity protection duties for other purposes, the supervisor directly responsible and other individuals directly accountable shall be subject to penalties in accordance with the law.
